## General help with data cloning related modeling questions

Subscribe to the [dclone-users mailing list](https://groups.google.com/forum/?fromgroups#!forum/dclone-users).

## Issues with software

Submit an issue on GitHub:

* [dclone R package](https://github.com/datacloning/dclone/issues),
* [dcmle R package](https://github.com/datacloning/dcmle/issues),
* [dcextras R package](https://github.com/datacloning/dcextras/issues).
